sentences.sContent: Stamen is most, helix is arranged, centrifugal direction development, sometimes little at 10, often have degrade staminal .
sentences.sContent_eng: Stamen is most, helix is arranged, centrifugal direction development, sometimes little at 10, often have degrade staminal .
sentences.sCn: 雄蕊多数，螺旋排列，离心方向发育，有时少于10个，常有退化雄蕊。

sentences.sContent: Based on the center of gravity of cab, this paper offers the improvement ways for helix spring and shock absorber of the heavy truck cab suspension.
sentences.sContent_eng: Based on the center of gravity of cab, this paper offers the improvement ways for helix spring and shock absorber of the heavy truck cab suspension.
sentences.sCn: 文章在测出某重卡驾驶室质心的基础上，对重卡驾驶室悬置系统中前、后螺旋弹簧及减振器的参数进行改进。

synos.tran: [数][建]螺旋，螺旋状物；[解剖]耳轮

phrases.pCn: 螺旋角；螺旋线角；螺旋升角；节面角（伞齿轮的）

trans.tranOther: a line that curves and rises around a central line
